content: {笑眯眯}Meeting {me} must be your lucky day.

{微笑}Every meeting with you is something to look forward to,
That's what makes life beautiful~
{幸福}Is happiness open for business today? Don't forget to smile~

{点头}Every time I see you, I can't help but think...
{笑眯眯}Having you as a neighbor is just wonderful!

{笑眯眯}I was just thinking about you, and {me} appeared,
{害羞}Seems like we're in sync.

We meet again!
Is it by chance, or do you
have something important to share with me?

{微笑}Nice to see you again!
What would you like to share with me this time?

Hello there! Though I've lost count 
of how many times we've met,
I still think it's proper to say hi~

You seem quite eager to chat with me today.
Is there something else on your mind?

{思考}I just realized I have something new
to look forward to every day,
{害羞}meeting {me} by chance
is such a delightful thing!

{笑哈哈}They say the most romantic reunions are the ones that take a few twists and turns,
{害羞}Did you deliberately take the scenic route
just to add a touch of drama to our story?

{微笑}The sunshine is gentle, the breeze is calm,
Everything's perfect on this new day,
Good morning~
[Pity Test] What can I help you with?

{开心}Good evening! The night sky is beautiful tonight,
Perfect for a walk!

{笑哈哈}It feels like we're playing hide and seek,
And you found me again~

{想象中}One meeting might be chance, but multiple times?
{害羞}Could it be fate?
{微笑}How was your day?

{惊！}Is this really only our first time meeting?
{害羞}I wouldn't mind running into you a few more times~

{笑哈哈}We meet again!
{笑眯眯}We seem to be especially in sync today,
Out of countless paths, we chose the one where we'd meet~

{思考}I felt like I forgot something today,
{开心}Ah, it's because I hadn't seen you yet!

{想象中}I was just wondering why the afternoon sun suddenly felt less scorching,
{笑眯眯}and then you appeared~
{微笑}Hello there! Have you been taking good care of yourself today?
